name: Boros (itch) (Planschi)
description:
You control a Dragon which has to wrap/surround golden rings to progress!

"WASD" to move.

"R" to reset level.

"J" to skip level.

A game by Planschi

Im happy for every feedback! Pls write a comment!

This games was made in one Weekend for #jimjam2.

Made from scratch no assets used! I composed the music (but I didn't record the sounds of the instruments).

>>>Unfortunately I can't test the Mac and Linux build !!!<<<
